title: Carrot, almond and blue cheese salad
ingredients: ['900g carrots, peeled and thinly sliced on the diagonal', '55g flaked almonds', '2 cloves garlic, finely choppe', '4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 tablespoon cider vinegar', '40g dried cranberries', '115g crumbled Danish blue cheese', '40g rocket leaves']
